meanings.definition: A local government body in Russia.
meanings.sent1: The zemstvo in Russia helps make decisions for the local community.
meanings.sent2: People in Russia participate in the zemstvo to have a say in local matters.
meanings.sent3: The zemstvo in Russia organized a fun fair for the community.
meanings.sent4: The zemstvo is like a small town council, working together for the people.
meanings.sent5: I remember the zemstvo as the heart of our town, always there to support us.

meanings.definition: The system of local government in Russia.
meanings.sent1: The zemstvo system in Russia has been in place for many years.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the zemstvo system is important for those living in Russia.
meanings.sent3: The zemstvo system in Russia is known for its efficiency and transparency.
meanings.sent4: In Russia, the zemstvo system is the backbone of local governance.
meanings.sent5: Learning about the zemstvo system helped me appreciate our local government structure.
